casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

November 30, 2007

[Cite as 11130/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-6329.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-1247. Harris v. Mt. Sinai Med. Ctr., 2007-Ohio-5587.

Cuyahoga App. Nos. 85286, 85574, and 85605, 166 Ohio App.3d 647, 2006-Ohio-2206. Reported at Slip Opinion No. 2007-Ohio-5587.

Upon consideration of appellee’s motion for settlement conference, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
